metadata.title: Endika Orube | Tech Lead & Manager · Product Engineer
metadata.description: Endika Orube's portfolio. Tech Lead & Manager in digital banking (+1M users). 7+ years leading teams, architecture, XP and Context Engineering with AI.

about.description1: 7+ years building software that matters. Started doing a bit of everything and now I lead a team of 20+ developers on a critical digital banking project (+1M users). Tech Lead and Engineering Manager.
about.description2: Architecture, testing, XP. I love the technical side. But what really matters to me is that what we build actually serves a purpose. From definition to delivery.

product.title: PRODUCT FIRST
product.description: I don't write code for the sake of it. I work with business and design to understand the real problem before touching a line. From problem to delivery, with the user in mind.

architecture.title: CODE THAT SCALES
architecture.description: TDD, Pair Programming, Refactoring, CI/CD. Not as dogma—as tools. Hexagonal Architecture when it makes sense. The goal: code the team can actually maintain down the road.

xp.title: PRAGMATISM
xp.description: Pragmatic, not dogmatic. Adapting best practices to real-world context: deadlines, team maturity, business constraints. Balancing quality and needs.

contextEngineering.title: CONTEXT ENGINEERING
contextEngineering.description: Designing the team's Context Engineering strategy. Standardizing best practices and integrating generative AI into the development cycle. Faster, without losing control.

leadership.title: TEAMS THAT GROW
leadership.description: Direct manager of 8 engineers. 1-on-1s, career plans, ongoing feedback. Also an XP course instructor where we teach what matters: clean code, testing, teamwork.

culture.title: CULTURE OF GROWTH
culture.description: Responsible for technical training of 80+ people. Leading the knowledge strategy: tech talks, learning paths, spaces to grow. Knowledge multiplies when shared.

biko2Lead.description: Leading the frontend team (+20 devs) of digital banking (+1M users). Technical direction, people management, and an eye on the product.

engineering.title: Engineering & Product Strategy
engineering.text: Collaborating with Product Owners, Business Stakeholders, and Design to define technical solutions. Leading the Angular → React migration focused on security, Time-to-Market and UX.

excellence.title: Technical Excellence & XP
excellence.text: TDD, Continuous Integration, Pair Programming. Robust architecture capable of evolving with the business.

innovation.title: Innovation & Applied AI
innovation.text: Defining the Context Engineering strategy (Rules, Commands, MCPs). The team develops faster and with fewer bugs.

management.title: People Management
management.text: Direct manager of 8 engineers. 1-on-1s, career plans and continuous training.

biko2Senior.description: Core developer building the new booking engine (high traffic). Strict XP, for real.

architecture.title: Architecture & Modern Stack
architecture.text: Next.js + Hexagonal Architecture deployed on Vercel. SEO and Core Web Vitals optimized.

product.title: Product Vision & Design
product.text: Key link between design and development. Translated complex mockups into efficient components.

observability.title: Observability & Production
observability.text: Monitoring and alerting strategies (Sentry/Datadog) for service stability.

quality.title: Quality & Culture
quality.text: TDD and CI/CD. Mentoring of new team members to accelerate onboarding.

nubbaLead.description: Hybrid role of technical leadership and product. Final responsible for delivery in own SaaS products and consulting.

product.title: End-to-End Product Management
product.text: Full lifecycle: technical pre-sales, requirements, UX/UI design, implementation, and maintenance.

business.title: Business Strategy
business.text: Translated technical demos and market feedback into the product roadmap. University of Navarra, Doctors Without Borders.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership & Mentoring
leadership.text: Defined architecture and standards. Transformed team from 1 to 5 developers.

nubbaFullStack.description: Second developer in a 4-person startup. Critical responsibility from day one in Web and Mobile development.

development.title: End-to-End Development
development.text: Custom solutions for corporate clients and internal SaaS products.

stack.title: Technology Stack
stack.text: Backend (PHP/Symfony, MySQL), Frontend (Angular 2+) and Hybrid Mobile (Ionic).

culture.title: Startup Culture
culture.text: Problem-solving mindset. Critical incident management in limited resource environment.

banking.title: ONLINE BANKING (+1M USERS)
banking.description: Angular → React migration of critical infrastructure. Mass scale architecture, banking security and optimized UX. Leading 20+ devs.

booking.title: BOOKING ENGINE
booking.description: Next.js + Hexagonal. Extreme performance and Core Web Vitals for conversion. Strict XP and code quality.

saas.title: STARTUP & SAAS
saas.description: From idea to production. Own products (RescueOnTime, Inallow) and 360º consulting. Business and tech vision.

labs.title: PERSONAL LABS & OPEN SOURCE
labs.description: Space for technical experimentation. Personal projects, talk demos, developer tools, and exploration of new paradigms (AI, RSC, Performance).

p1.name: PERSONAL PORTFOLIO
p1.desc: Next.js 16, Framer Motion and Tailwind v4.

p2.name: REACT RENDERING STRATEGIES
p2.desc: CSR, SSG, ISR, SSR, Streaming, PPR and RSC with Next.js.

p3.name: AI WORKSHOP SCPNA + POKÉDEX
p3.desc: Vite. DDD + Hexagonal Architecture + Testing. AI integration.

p4.name: CREAYARNOZ LANDING
p4.desc: Landing page for graphic design and printing studio.

teaching.title: XP & SOFTWARE ENGINEERING COURSE
teaching.description: Training that goes beyond code: learning to develop valuable software in a professional, sustainable, and agile manner.

topics.engineering: Engineering & Quality: TDD, Testing Strategies, Refactoring, Simple Design and Clean Code.
topics.architecture: Architecture & Methodologies: Extreme Programming, Hexagonal Architecture, Agile, CI/CD and Pair Programming.
topics.culture: Culture & Profession: Shared Knowledge, Ethics in Development, UX for developers and Career Development.

vibe.title: BEYOND 'VIBE CODING' WITH AI
vibe.description: Context Engineering and strategies to integrate AI in professional development without losing quality.

rendering.title: RENDERING STRATEGIES IN REACT
rendering.description: Technical deep dive: CSR, SSR, SSG, ISR, RSC. Modern architectures and their impact on Performance and SEO.

me.headline: Code. Teams. Product.
me.description: Curious by nature, pragmatic by conviction. I lead teams and solve problems with software.

aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.description: Endika Orube: Tech Lead & Manager of 20+ devs in digital banking. Specialist in XP, hexagonal architecture and Context Engineering with AI. Teacher and speaker in the tech community.

blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.description: Articles on technical leadership, software architecture, TDD, Context Engineering and professional development.

blog.subtitle: What I keep learning. About teams, product, code, and everything in between.
